document.full_text: red bulls defender tim ream is waiting anxiously for the release of the u.s. roster for next month's concacaf gold cup. the roster will be announced on monday.
document.title: dreaming of the gold cup
lines_and_colors: red bulls defender tim ream is waiting anxiously for the release of the u.s. roster for next month's concacaf gold cup. the roster will be announced on monday.
